titleStmt.title: The advice of Charles the Fifth, Emperor of Germany, and King of Spain, to his son Philip the Second upon his resignation of the crown of Spain to his said son.
titleStmt.author: Charles V, Holy Roman Emperor, 1500-1558.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Mortlock, at the sign of the White Hart in Westminster-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
